name: Sonic Heroes Windows 10 Edition
description: Sonic Heroes Windows 10 Edition is the original sonic heroes with compatibility mods for windows 10 to allow you to run the game and I have included a mod setting which allows you to change the resolution and frame rate. It is the full game because I will spare gamers who want to play buying a dodgy Copy Of the web  !WARNING! I really advise you look at Setup instructions. see below . If you still have issues Please contact me at razergamez77@gmail.com  and I will try to help you as best as I can!
